tips.li: RimJobWorld runs on porn logic.
RimJobWorld is a community project with over 20 contributors.
RimJobWorld is open source and accepts submissions from anyone.
The average bra size in RimJobWorld is 85DD. If you think that can't possibly be right because your wife has D cups and she is pretty big then she should probably be wearing a G cup.
Most women wear a bra with a too small cup size and a too large band size.
Relative frequency of male and female pawns can be controlled in RimJobWorld mod settings.
Frequency of male pawns with breasts and females with penises can be controlled in RimJobWorld mod settings.
Necrophilia is disabled by default. It can be enabled in RimJobWorld mod settings.
Bestiality is disabled by default. It can be enabled in RimJobWorld mod settings.
Rape is disabled by default. It can be enabled in RimJobWorld mod settings.
Cannibalism is enabled by default. It can't be disabled in RimJobWorld mod settings because it is a feature of the base game.
Sex need has a great many configuration options in RimJobWorld mod settings.
Quirks are visible in the "show sexuality" menu on the bio tab (the icon looks like a heart).
Sexual preference is visible in the "show sexuality" menu on the bio tab (the icon looks like a heart).
Condoms can be automatically used if placed in a stockpile next to a bed - it might be a good idea to have some around if you want to avoid unwanted pregnancies.
Being sexually pent up lowers colonists' moods - be sure to let them blow off some steam!
Humpshrooms and Aphrodisiacs can improve a pawn's mood, but also cause extreme arousal and can lead to more permanent alterations if abused.
Rape will cause an extreme mood debuff, though after a while they might start to like the abuse.
Sometimes a threat might be able to be subdued through sex and submission if you lack the firepower to deal with it.
Some types of sex (such as sex with animals) have a chance of leaving a permanent mark on a pawn's psyche.
Are your colonists bored? Let them have a tussle under the sheets, that'll cheer them up.
The "Submit" button is one of the most powerful features added by any mod.
RimJobWorld does not add any lewd graphics, you will need another mod for that. For example rimnude or rjw_animations.
If you like twenty-breasted tittysnakes then try the Nephila submod.
RimJobWorld is not compatible with the "Lost Forest" mod. This is a deliberate choice on the part of the author of Lost Forest to break your save if you have this mod installed.
RimJobWorld has birth and pregnancy features, but no babies. Children will be born fully grown unless you have another mod that changes that.
If you use RJW with any alien race mods make sure you also install "RJW Race Support". Otherwise your Ewok won't have a raccoon penis.
